name: clarinet
description: SAX based evented streaming JSON parser in JavaScript (browser and node)

scripts.test: mocha -r should -t 10000 -s 2000 test/parser.spec.js test/clarinet.js test/npm.js test/utf8-chunks.js test/position.js
scripts.prebench: cd benchmark && test -e node_modules || npm i --ignore-scripts
